remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要定义的单元格，指定的。To define a for a cell, specify a of . 一个可以应用于在表、 列或单元格级别的单元格。A can be applied to a cell at the table, column, or cell level. 若要将应用列中的所有单元格，设置属性，它将优先于属性。To apply a to all cells in a column, set the property, which takes precedence over the property. 若要将应用到单个单元格，设置属性是直接在对象，将优先于所有其他应用于单元格的样式。To apply a to an individual cell, set the property directly on the object, which takes precedence over all other styles that you apply to the cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置该列相对于 中其他列的显示位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the display position of the column relative to the other columns in the .

value.span: 当列显示在关联的 中时，该列从零开始的位置。

span.span: The zero-based position of the column, as it is displayed in the associated .

value.span: 注册的默认值为-1。

span.span: The registered default is -1.

value.span: 有关可能影响该值的因素的信息，请参见 。

span.span: For information about what can influence the value, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性具有默认值为-1 添加到之前集合。The property has a default value of -1 before it is added to the collection. 此值将更新时将列添加到。This value is updated when the column is added to the . 要求每个列的属性必须是介于 0 到的唯一整数的-1。The requires that the property of each column must be a unique integer from 0 to the of -1. 因此，当的一列更改的更改通常会使的其他列，也会更改。Therefore, when the of one column changes, the change typically causes the of other columns to also change. 上的限制值强制实施机制。The restrictions on the value are enforced by a mechanism. 如果尝试设置一个值，不是有效，则会运行时异常。If you attempt to set a value that is not valid, a run-time exception is thrown. 时的值更改属性时，引发事件。When the value of the property is changed, the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以设置中的单个列。Use this property to set the for an individual column in the . 若要定义的拖动指示器中，指定的。To define a for the drag indicator, specify a of . 要更改的某些元素的拖动指示器，例如列标题的边框外观的样式中，可以设置属性。You can set properties in the style to change the appearance of certain elements of the drag indicator, such as the border around the column header. 但是，使用的默认模板的拖动指示器绘制正被拖动的原始列标题的图像。However, the default template for the drag indicator uses a to paint a with an image of the original column header that is being dragged. 因此，如果在样式中设置某些属性如或，它们将显示以不会应用。As a result, if you set some properties in your style, such as or , they will appear to not be applied. 若要更改列标题的显示方式进行拖动时，应用不使用默认值的新模板。To change the appearance of the column header while it is being dragged, apply a new template that does not use the default .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能用于冻结列。 cannot be used to freeze a column. 与此相反，设置属性。Instead, set the property. 最高为指定的列的最左侧列数将就地冻结。The leftmost columns up to the column that is specified by the number will freeze in place. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从选择"冻结列"时冻结列。The following example shows how to freeze a column when "Freeze Column" is selected from the . 列以包含在冻结的列向左移动。Columns are moved to the left in order to be included in the frozen columns. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`true`中的单个列进行的所有单元格，只读的。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only. 设置属性设置为`true`使中的所有单元格只读的。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in the read-only. 设置属性设置为`true`进行的单个单元格，只读的。Set the property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only. 如果在设置之间存在冲突，列或单元格级别，值为`true`的值的优先级高于`false`。If a conflict exists between the settings at the , column, or cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 针对每个所选的单元格，若要检索的默认单元格内容调用此方法。This method is called for each selected cell to retrieve the default cell content. 然后引发事件。It then raises the event. 您可以处理要修改的单元格内容，它返回之前的事件。You can handle the event to modify the cell content before it is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用作帮助程序，如果提供的自定义粘贴实现。This method can be used as a helper if you provide a custom paste implementation for the . 单元格内容存储在`item`对象。The cell content is stored in the `item` object. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event. 您可以处理事件修改单元格内容，然后将其粘贴到该单元格。You can handle the event to modify the cell content before it is pasted into the cell. 可以设置`cellContent`到`null`取消粘贴操作。You can set `cellContent` to `null` to cancel the paste action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取存储在单元格内容之前，事件处理程序可以修改剪贴板内容。Event handlers can modify the clipboard content before it gets stored in the cell content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的列类型重写此方法以响应由指示的用户笔势`editingEventArgs`，然后在编辑之前返回的当前值。Derived column types override this method to respond to the user gesture that is indicated by `editingEventArgs` and to return the current value before editing.
